C

calculate() - Method in class co.simplon.p25.loaning.calculator.AbstractCalculator
Template method implementing the algorithm skeleton, and delegating specific calculation to sub-classes.
calculate() - Method in interface co.simplon.p25.loaning.calculator.Calculator
The calculate method to be implemented with specific schedule calculation.
calculator(Request) - Method in enum co.simplon.p25.loaning.calculator.ScheduleMethod
Fabric method returning an instance of the calculator for this calculation method.
Calculator - Interface in co.simplon.p25.loaning.calculator
Exposes a single calculate method.
Cli - Class in co.simplon.p25.loaning.ui
A Command Line Interface backed by a Scanner.
CliException - Exception in co.simplon.p25.loaning.ui
An exception to be thrown when a CLI general error occurs.
CliException(String) - Constructor for exception co.simplon.p25.loaning.ui.CliException
Creates a new CliException with given message.
CliException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception co.simplon.p25.loaning.ui.CliException
Creates a new CliException with given message and cause.
CliInputs - Class in co.simplon.p25.loaning.ui
Represents the user converted and validated schedule request inputs from the CLI.
CliInputs.Builder - Class in co.simplon.p25.loaning.ui
A builder to build CliInputs instances.
CliInputsException - Exception in co.simplon.p25.loaning.ui
An exception to be thrown when a conversion or validation error occurs.
CliInputsException() - Constructor for exception co.simplon.p25.loaning.ui.CliInputsException
Creates a new CliInputsException.
CliUtil - Class in co.simplon.p25.loaning.ui
An utility class with static methods to help reading and writing from/to the CLI.
co.simplon.p25.loaning - package co.simplon.p25.loaning
Root package of the Loaning application.
co.simplon.p25.loaning.calculator - package co.simplon.p25.loaning.calculator
The calculator package providing classes to calculate requested amortization schedule based on different calculation methods.
co.simplon.p25.loaning.ui - package co.simplon.p25.loaning.ui
This package contains classes for the "User Interface", a CLI-like backed by a Scanner.
